column5: Get bidding guys... my trip comes complete with waypoints (if you bring a handheld GPS   )  It's going to feel like highway robbery if Wayne's trip doesn't get more bids!!!
Or you could forget about the fishing and just go swimming and hang out on the beach together (with Dan)

Two things I am surprised with are Wayne's and bass haven season pass only at $50 that's less then 4 launches and it's paid for its self.  I must thank everyone as this is going great. I will get updates tomorrow I am bushed and need to get to bed for early work day again tomorrow

Come'on folks!! Too many things going way too cheap here. Your chance to own a Spiel Special rod. Muskie charter with Mike P ... Perchin with DanB .. streamin with Ryan or the dreaded 2 days and 2 nights with Leah and I   ! All still well below what they are worth and remember the "prize" is just a bonus, the bid is to support Cancer Research !
I'd be all over your generous offer Wayne if I wasn't already heading to Temagami for a week in early June followed by Lakair 3 days later.
thanks for putting this together Mike, it was nice chatting when you stopped in to pick up the rods.

Dave I wanted to stop over tonight but the wife said NO we were in the Burg running the kids dance I said i would be right back that was around 6pm she had little faith in me leaving to get back in time for 7pm LOL.  Oh yeah Pinky said to say Hi to Pinky.  As for all others I will update in the am things have been busy with late running for work and just getting in from this teen dance thing tonight.  Thanks again for all the bids and donations

OK everyone, Mike and Danna have done an amazing job with this. Show your support and get some bids going. Currently there are fishing trips available for Lake Temagami, Bay of Quinte, Lake St. Clair, Mitchell's Bay, Deer Creek and Long Point Bay. Every one is way under it's value right now.  Not much time left
Facebook is down for a few hours were going to need a bidding extension! ;o)
:rofl2:  :rofl2:
i just donated 2 different fishing items tonigth, please stop in and bid!!!

Good Luck Dan this is getting entertaining  Ryan yep its extended until next Sunday well alot of people thought it was just until tomorrow but its not over yet still have donations coming in we have broke the $1000 mark already that is awesome.  Brian I must say Brian sure does love his spinner baits with a $80 bid  I just updated all the bids and must again thank everyone
One day I'll own a Spiel rod, Wayne just delayed that
I have one on order,so my funds for that one are ,,,,,,,,,,,,none. I can say though,I have now seen his work first hand. That rod is much more then 150.
It's worth more than the $250 we're at as well.... I don't imagine I'll be the owner, but if I am you may still get another chance Dan!  I hear a near North Getaway is up for auction as well...

Well all I can say is Holy Crap Thanks Wayne  Amazing Getaway for two on Lake Tamagami! Donated by Wayne O'Shea PLEASE NOTE**** THIS ITEM WILL FOLLOW DIFFERENT RULES! BID STARTS AT $450 (as requested by donator) BID INCREMENTS ARE $50 (also requested by donator) please read the description below for info :   Here’s the perfect chance to donate to a great cause and in return have the opportunity to spend TWO full days and nights at a Lake Temagami Island private retreat, at a mutually agreeable time between mid June and late September. The earlier you pick your dates the better, as our “dance” card is still pretty empty at this point from family and friends for 2012. It won’t be for long though, as the calendar fills up pretty fast and we will have to plan around our daughter’s next sarcoma check up that should be in July. This “package” can be any days of the week…. doesn’t have to be a weekend, but can be.  This auction is for TWO people, for TWO days and nights accommodations, with all meals included, and two FULL (8 to 10 hour) days of fishing/touring Lake Temagami aboard a fully equipped 2150 Lund Baron.  http://www.irishfield.on.ca/gallery/june3.jpg   You choose what you want to do. Down rigging / flat lining for Lake Trout and Pickeral….casting for Pickeral/Bass/Pike in back bays…or we can mix it up, including a scenic tour of the North end of the lake if you so wish. Your call !  Perfect get away for a couple, or we can also accommodate two lads/gals in separate bedrooms if needed. Plan would be for you to arrive late on the chosen day and we’ll pick you up from the local marinas dock to bring you out to our cottage. Settle in, go for a swim, have supper and then watch the sunset. Heck we may even let you use the hot tub!  http://www.irishfield.on.ca/gallery/Temtub.jpg  Then TWO full days of fishing and a late day departure on the “third” day. (ie: arrive late Friday.. leave late Sunday)  We will be there as well, just to make that clear, but what I am offering is something that is not available from anyone on the lake. Two full days of “charter” fishing, two nights accommodations, with all meals prepared. All you need to bring is your clothes, swimsuit, appropriate outerwear for the weather and your beverages. You can bring your favourite fishing gear, or you can just use mine… your choice. Great fishing right off the dock while you’re waiting for supper. If the winning bidder happens to be a couple and the wife (or husband) doesn’t want to spend all day or both days in a boat, and prefers a bit of sun tanning, canoeing or touring town…that can be arranged as well. While he/she’s doing that, we may find a different mode of transportation to an otherwise un-accessible location….but… no promises due to weather considerations for flying. Only real “house rule” is absolutely no smoking inside the cottage.  Minimum bid to start this auction is $450.00 and minimum bid raise increments are $50.  Bid High and bid often!  Thanks, Wayne
I hit my cash limit Wayne. But I found another way of getting some funds raised

Yep Dan your right Thanks Dan  GUIDED PERCH TRIP! 6 hour guided perch fishing trip on Long Point Bay for SEPTEMBER (When the perch are hot). All bait and tackle is provided. For up to two people worth $250. As a little bonus, if the 2nd person is a child, they will get a new rod and reel combo to use and take home. And all the fish will be cleaned and packed while the winners sit on the beach or swim at my cottage in Long Point Donated by Dan Bouck Value $250 BID STARTS $50  Oh Yeah its already at $100 Sat 11pm
LOL!! It does come with spinner baits doesn't it?
Some bids are coming in but more are needed
Well the first of what should be many for this trip. Thanks again to everyone for donations and bids
Brian it might you just need to win and look inside
Does that include air fair?  Nice offering.
It does
Dan. I don't think Wayne's trip should go to a non fisherman just saying. I will get updates tonight heading to Ohio right mow
I'm sure someone on here will jump all over it.

I hope so lads... it's currently way too cheap for what's possible. Consider what even two days of "charter" fishing are worth... let alone all meals and accomodations!  Maybe some more folks here on OFC will stick their heads in and buy some items, on this wonderful Auction that Mike and his wife are putting on.

PLEASE KNOW THAT I CAN NOT ACCEPT BIDS FROM OFC AFTER 7PM ON SUNDAY AS I MIGHT NOT GET THEM ENTERED ONTO THE FACEBOOK PAGE SO PLEASE BID BEFORE THEN IF YOUR INTERESTED. Game is Monday July 2nd at Comerica park against the Twins! Donated by Deb Riedl Logan (they are there own tickets they gave up for this its the day after Canada day so most will have it off) BID STARTS AT $15  Bid was at $55 Sat 7:45pm     Sunny Acres Resort on Cameron Lake one week camping For this item if you love camping fishing and great people this is one item that will not disappoint. We have been going to Sunny Acres for years now and it is a great place with musky,Walleye,Bass, Crappie,perch and all the pan fish you want. They are 5 min from Fenelon Falls where there are great small shops to spend a afternoon at. There is a ice cream shop right there so grab a ice cream cone and watch the boat locks it is alot of fun to watch them. If you have not been to Cameron lake please ask me I will give you a bunch of pointers for sure. If you're looking at it on Facebook... top right corner. Click "ask to join group" and Mike or his wife will add you in and then you can comment / bid. On here only and no Facebook.. I believe Mike will Proxy bid for you...
Yep Wayne has it down right. The wife tried to make it so anyone could join but FB makes you approve everyone

Can't believe nobody is jumping on Wayne's trip. 20 hour Lake Temagami charter, a possible fly in, all meals, LEAH!!! It's only at $550. The campground is a few hundred feet away if you want to spend a couple more nights there up there.

Well we have more to bid on thanks to Ryan he donated a trip fishing I am not able to do a full up date as I'm on my phone but things are heating up. Thanks ryan.  The bid on his trip is $75  Oh yeah Brian I guess Ryan likes movies more then you do as the movie card is st$65

Hey Everyone,  Just a heads up that Mike P. is hosting an online auction to help raise money for The 2012 Fish-A-Thon For A Cure. Bidding starts on March 23rd and there are some great prizes up for grabs.  Check it out Here  I'll be bidding on the camping trip for Fenelon Falls
Big Thanks to Mike and Family for doing this up! They're awesome and we can't thank them enough!   :thumbsup_anim:
Way to go, Mike and Danna!!!!!
Yes congrats to Mike Parker and his wife for this worthwhile cause!!
Is there any way to see this without a Facebook account?
I don't think so, I'm sure a list of items can be made and sent to you.
I was thinking the same thing.  Good on all involved.

Lets get it started.
I hear ya Brian but the wife said we have to wait until Friday as we're still getting stuff in.

Well as always Spiel (Chris) has come through with one of his custom built rods and this one will be built to your specs he has donated  Custom Frontier spinning rod.  SR720-1 - blank matte grey 6' Lure weight - 1/32-1/8 Line WT 1 -4  Great perch or small stream trout rod.  he said he will wait for the auction to be over and build it to the needs of the winner.

Some real awesome items in there. This is gonna be a great success. I hope to bid on a few and pass the word to many! Kudos to all involved especially Mike, such a great idea with an awesome community here to support it.
Thanks Ron Spread the word.  I just got some more specs from Chris on the custom rod he has donated  Further to the build it'll have custom cork handle, Fuji graphite seat and Fuji Alconite guides.
